issue.title: [Dev] merge_arrow_pr.py doesn't detect Co-authored-by:
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18053](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18053). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For example, `Co-authored-by:` in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14381/commits/41b7f26a3631c5c6cfa3abd369fbf39263cfb536 isn't detected.

comments.body:
